        private static void setNewScene(javafx.scene.Scene scene,

        Sets the scene on the stage to the specified scene
        Parameters:
        scene - New scene to be shown
        title - Title of the window, as string
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - If the scene parameter is null
